original_text: And Solomon told her all her questions: and there was nothing hid from Solomon which he told her not.
korean_text: 솔로몬이 그가 묻는 말에 다 대답하였으니 솔로몬이 몰라서 대답하지 못한 것이 없었더라

sentences.original_text: And Solomon told her all her questions
and there was nothing hid from Solomon

sentences.korean_translation: 그가 그녀에게 말하지 않은 것이 없었다
